attributes.action: abolish presciption charges for Heart disease
attributes.additional_details: People with long term Heart Disease who are within the 18-60 age group are often having to pay in excess of £50 a month for medicines to simply keep them alive.  I suggest as one the UK's biggest killers the government must look at changing the charging system to include Heart Disease as one of the exempt groups.

rejection.details: Please see: Free prescriptions for anticoagulants (Warfarin, etc)
